name: Worms clone
description:
There's no exit button until you win the game, so exit = Alt F4. It's a very rough remake of Worms.

I had limited time this week, but I'm pretty happy with it even though I had to rush everything. It misses so many things, has no polish - but I had a good time, and learned new things. All assets and code done from scratch, the level bitmap made by my roommate. The level is a unity quad, and all 'physics' are pixel checks on the quad.
